channel.title: Need help with Wearing an item

item.title: Need help with Wearing an item
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

Hey guys, I’m trying to make it so when I wear this specific item on my server it increases hp, prayer and special attack, haven’t done anything like this before so I need a bit of help.

This is what I put in WearItem.java, it didn’t do anything though, just gave me a bunch of compiler errors. Not even sure if its possible it was just an idea, would be useful though.

[code] if(wearId == 773) {
c.getItems().updateSpecialBar();
c.gfx0(2015);
c.specAmount = 100000000;
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
c.playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.playerLevel[5] = 99999999;
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You feel the power flow through your body!");

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Wearing an item
